item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Cheating alleged after men's world conker champion found with steel chestnut (67 points | 83 comments)
2. Busy Status Bar (961 points | 306 comments)
3. Commonly used arm positions can overestimate blood pressure readings: study (204 points | 149 comments)
4. How to fork (18 points | discuss)
5. Turn your Android phone into a modern ham radio transceiver (290 points | 95 comments)
6. Gosub – An open-source browser engine (202 points | 118 comments)
7. The Physics of Magic Windows (2021) (84 points | 5 comments)
8. Shipping Threads in 5 months (26 points | 29 comments)
9. The web I want vs. the one we have (48 points | 47 comments)
10. Grandmaster Expelled from Team Chess Championship After Phone Found in Toilet (21 points | 1 comment)
11. The three-page paper that shook philosophy: Gettiers in software engineering (128 points | 75 comments)
12. Local TypeScript Super SDK to Call 200 LLMs (8 points | 4 comments)
13. Zamba2-7B (199 points | 36 comments)
14. Show HN: X11 tool to share a screen area in any video meeting (251 points | 116 comments)
15. Play 3.0 mini – A lightweight, reliable, cost-efficient Multilingual TTS model (146 points | 47 comments)
16. DeepSeek: Advancing theorem proving in LLMs through large-scale synthetic data (141 points | 37 comments)
17. Google commits to buying power generated by nuclear-energy startup Kairos Power (446 points | 278 comments)
18. Extracting financial disclosure and police reports with OpenAI Structured Output (162 points | 31 comments)
19. Zapata AI Ceases Operations (26 points | 16 comments)
20. Remains of an ancient Greek structure found in Croatia (67 points | 21 comments)
21. Show HN: Vortex – a high-performance columnar file format (158 points | 37 comments)
22. Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) Basics (41 points | 14 comments)
23. Automating the most annoying aspects of blogging (20 points | 8 comments)
24. PayloadCMS: Open-Source, Fullstack Next.js Framework (121 points | 38 comments)
25. New images show state of preservation of Ernest Shackleton's ship (76 points | 25 comments)
26. Cargo Airships Are Happening (70 points | 44 comments)
27. Deep learning-based detection of qanat water systems using spy satellite imagery (32 points | 1 comment)
28. Transmutation of Uranium and Thorium by Neutrons (1939) (6 points | 1 comment)
29. Lillian Schwartz, Pioneer in Computer-Generated Art, Dies at 97 (34 points | 5 comments)
30. Project Euler #912: Where are the Odds? (143 points | 61 comments)
